name: Bangladesh
interesting_fact: Bangladesh has the world's largest river delta, the Sundarbans, home to the Bengal tiger.

name: India
interesting_fact: India is the world's largest democracy and the birthplace of four major religions: Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and Sikhism.
tourist_place: Taj Mahal, Jaipur, Kerala Backwaters

name: China
interesting_fact: China has the world's longest wall, the Great Wall of China, spanning over 21,000 km.
tourist_place: Great Wall of China, Forbidden City, Zhangjiajie National Forest Park

name: Japan
interesting_fact: Japan has the world's oldest continuous monarchy, dating back over 2,600 years.

name: Australia
interesting_fact: Australia is home to the world's largest coral reef system, the Great Barrier Reef.

name: New Zealand
interesting_fact: New Zealand was the first country to give women the right to vote in 1893.

name: Brazil
interesting_fact: Brazil has the largest rainforest in the world, the Amazon Rainforest.

name: Argentina
interesting_fact: Argentina is the birthplace of the tango dance.

interesting_fact: The United States has the most billionaires in the world.

name: Canada
interesting_fact: Canada has the longest coastline of any country in the world.

name: United Kingdom
interesting_fact: Big Ben is actually the name of the bell inside the Elizabeth Tower, not the tower itself.
tourist_place: Buckingham Palace, Tower of London, Stonehenge

name: France
interesting_fact: France is the most visited country in the world.

name: Germany
interesting_fact: Germany is home to the world's largest beer festival, Oktoberfest.

name: Italy
interesting_fact: Rome has an entire country inside it—Vatican City, the smallest country in the world.

name: Russia
interesting_fact: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.

name: South Africa
interesting_fact: South Africa has three capital cities: Pretoria (administrative), Cape Town (legislative), and Bloemfontein (judicial).

name: Egypt
interesting_fact: Egypt has the last remaining wonder of the ancient world: the Great Pyramid of Giza.

interesting_fact: Kenya is famous for the Great Wildebeest Migration in the Maasai Mara.

interesting_fact: Saudi Arabia is home to Islam's two holiest cities, Mecca and Medina.
